overview: Ben Dover takes MILF to another level in "Yummy Mummies". This flick features foursomes in almost every scene. Each "mummie" is extra "yummie," especially the incredibly stacked Victoria (who receives double vaginal) and Georgina, a divorced "mummie" who when asked what she wants to do replies in a seductive smile while smoking, "I just want to get fucked!" That's more like it!
title: Ben Dover's Yummy Mummies Vol. 1
